sentences.chinese: 孝景皇帝者，孝文之中子也。
sentences.literal: Emperor Xiaojing was Emperor Xiaowen's middle son.
sentences.idiomatic: Emperor Xiaojing was the middle son of Emperor Xiaowen.
His mother was Empress Dowager Dou.

sentences.chinese: 孝文在代時，前后有三男，及竇太后得幸，前后死，及三子更死，故孝景得立。
sentences.literal: When Xiaowen was in Dai, he had three sons before and after, and when Empress Dowager Dou found favor, the previous ones died, and the three sons died again, therefore Xiaojing was able to be established.
sentences.idiomatic: While Emperor Xiaowen was still in Dai as prince, he had three sons from earlier and later periods. After Empress Dowager Dou rose to power, the previous sons died, and then those three sons died as well. This is why Emperor Xiaojing was able to ascend the throne.

sentences.literal: First year fourth month yimao, granted amnesty to all under Heaven.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth month of his first year, on the yimao day, he granted a general amnesty throughout the empire.

sentences.literal: Yisi, bestowed nobility one level on the people.
sentences.idiomatic: On the yisi day, he granted the common people one level of nobility rank.

sentences.chinese: 五月，除田半租，為孝文立太宗廟。
sentences.literal: Fifth month, eliminated half land tax, established Supreme Ancestral Temple for Xiaowen.
Ordered assembled ministers without court congratulations.
Xiongnu entered Dai, made agreement for peaceful marriage alliance.

sentences.chinese: 二年春，封故相國蕭何孫系為武陵侯。
sentences.literal: Second year spring, enfeoffed former Prime Minister Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling.
Fourth month renwu, Empress Dowager Xiaowen collapsed.
Kings of Guangchuan and Changsha all went to their states.

sentences.chinese: 八月，以御史大夫開封陶青為丞相。
sentences.literal: Eighth month, made Imperial Secretary Kaifeng Tao Qing Prime Minister.
